title: i can't get over honor 0
body: I cant get over honor 0, no matter how much i get honored in my games, it even said "you have unlocked honor"

replies.body: Once you've unlocked honor you'll be able to earn mastery chests and key fragments again, that doesn't necessarily mean your rank has gone up. After playing more games and gaining more honor you'll be able to rank back up before long.
i've played like 50+ games since i got a 14 days suspension, and almost every game i got atleast 1 honor, mby 1/2 was co-op, so could that be why?
